artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.2: <Erysus> The scent of blood fills me with delight…
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.3: <Erysus> Unbefitting of an elder? Don't say that, I'm just a mirror image.
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.4: <Erysus> You feel stronger? That's good to hear.
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.5: <Erysus> 赤い花を咲かせましょう？
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.7: <Erysus> 君といると退屈しないよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.8: <Erysus> ん、意外と頑張るよね君
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.9: <Erysus> えーっと...ふふ、何言おうとしたか忘れちゃった
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.low_favor.10: <Erysus> 私のこと物騒な女の子って思ってたりしない？
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.1: <Erysus> 君って私のこと結構好きだよね？ふふふ
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.2: <Erysus> You've been wearing these for a while now…
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.3: <Erysus> I've been feeling happy being around you lately.
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.5: <Erysus> So you still chose me even when I've barely been helping around.
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.8: <Erysus> I love the scent of blood, but yours isn't all too bad either.
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.9: <Erysus> …Not thinking of throwing me away are you?
artifact.elder_set.msg.idle.high_favor.1: <Erysus> よくこんな物騒な女の子と一緒にいるよね君も...酔狂かい？
artifact.elder_set.msg.kill.near_enemy.l: <Erysus> 血みどろだね！楽しんでる？
<Erysus> まだ近くに残ってる奴がいるかも？
<Erysus> 最高だね！楽しい時間だ！
<Erysus> いいね！いい殺しっぷりだ！
<Erysus> まだ油断しちゃダメだよ？
<Erysus> いい感じだよ！その調子！
artifact.elder_set.msg.kill.near_enemy.h: <Erysus> 私って役に立ってるよね？そうなら嬉しいな
<Erysus> まだまだ楽しんでいこうよ！ずっと、楽しんでいたいな
<Erysus> 君とこうしてる時間が...一番好きだな
<Erysus> また殺せた。もっと、もっとだよ...
<Erysus> あはは！汚れちゃったかも！今度きれいに洗ってね！
<Erysus> どんどん殺していこうよ！楽しいでしょ？
<Erysus> 楽しい。やっぱり楽しいよ。君が来てから、ずっと楽しいんだ
<Erysus> いいよ、いい。もっとやろうよ！
<Erysus> あーあ。もう殺しちゃったの？次にいこうか
<Erysus> 油断しないでね！まだ残ってるみたい！
artifact.elder_set.msg.kill.no_enemies.l: <Erysus> 殲滅完了！残党はいないかもね！
<Erysus> 周囲に敵影なし...でも油断はしないで？
<Erysus> もっと楽しみたかったね？
<Erysus> *しかし だれもこなかった...なんちゃって
<Erysus> ちょっとだけ休憩しよ？
<Erysus> さーって、誰もいなくなったね？
<Erysus> もう終わり？楽しかったね
<Erysus> そして誰もいなくなった...ふふふ
artifact.elder_set.msg.kill.no_enemies.h: <Erysus> 終わっちゃった？そっか。少しさみしいな
<Erysus> 殲滅完了。ご褒美に抱きしめてあげよっか？
<Erysus> お疲れ。近くに敵はいないよ。
<Erysus> 周囲に敵影なし！これで二人っきりだね...
<Erysus> *LOVEが  あがった。...あはは！私のだよ
<Erysus> ちょっと休もうよ。あんまり急がないでもいいでしょ？
<Erysus> あーあ。楽しい時間が終わっちゃった。次があるって約束してよ
<Erysus> ...君と二人ならどんな状況でも生き残れる気がするよ
<Erysus> 小さな兵隊さんが二人...焼かれるのは愛にしとこっか？
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.3: <Erysus> 内蔵が掻き回される感覚、私は好きだな
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.4: <Erysus> ちょっと、服巻き込んで治さないでよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.5: <Erysus> そんなに寿命を減らしてまで治したい？...冗談だよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.6: <Erysus> 死体に回復ってしたことある？面白いよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.8: <Erysus> 私のことも癒やしてよ。私はもう治らないけどね
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.9: <Erysus> あーあ。私も回復とか使いたいよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.low_favor.10: <Erysus> スティムパックを注射...なーんちゃって
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.1: <Erysus> もっと、もっと気持ちよくしてよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.2: <Erysus> 痛みが和らぐたび、たまにつらい気持ちにもなるんだ...変かな？
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.3: <Erysus> 君には死んでほしくないよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.4: <Erysus> 命って生きてる間しか救えないからね！
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.5: <Erysus> 傷跡すら残らないのは、ちょっとさみしいな
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.6: <Erysus> 胸の痛みってのは治らないね。抱きしめてくれなきゃ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.7: <Erysus> 君が傷ついてるのは私のせいじゃないよね...そうといってよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.8: <Erysus> 私だって治したいんだよ。私だって...
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.9: <Erysus> 心の痛みを和らげる方法を試してみる？
artifact.elder_set.msg.heal.high_favor.1: <Erysus> まだ痛むなら言ってよ。話し相手にはなれるよ。それ以上は求めないで...
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.1: <Erysus> 大丈夫？！逃げたほうがいいよ！
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.3: <Erysus> そろそろまずいかもしれないよ
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.5: <Erysus> これ以上の損傷はまずいかも...
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.6: <Erysus> 頑張って、生きる希望はまだあるから！
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.8: <Erysus> 一旦引いたほうがいいんじゃない？
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.9: <Erysus> 言っとくけど自動回復みたいなことできないからね？
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.low_favor.10: <Erysus> 体力が低いね...死なないといいんだけど
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.2: <Erysus> 君と一緒なら死んでも怖くないけどさぁ...やめてよ？
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.3: <Erysus> 早いうちに対処してよ。私にはどうにもできないけどね
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.4: <Erysus> 安心して、私と一緒ならどうにでもなるでしょ？回復は除くものとしてさ
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.5: <Erysus> 私のこと死に装束にするつもり？！
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.6: <Erysus> 激しいのが好きなの？今度試してみる？
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.7: <Erysus> 痛いよー...君と一緒なら耐えられるけどね
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.9: <Erysus> 随分と自分に自信があるね。その体力で耐えられると思ってるんでしょ？
artifact.elder_set.msg.dmgd.high_favor.1: <Erysus> カッコいいこと言いたかったけど思いつかないや。頑張ってね

effect.0336.name: Self-Loathing
effect.0336.desc: Decreases Movement Speed and MP Regen.
effect.0336.msg.1:
Wanna know the ugly truth?
No one will notice when you're gone.
effect.0336.msg.2:
When was the last time someone called out to you?
You can't remember.
effect.0336.msg.3:
Take a good look at the mirror.
It's the face nobody pays any mind.
effect.0336.msg.4:
You hear laughter from the other room.
A fun conversation, you excluded.
effect.0336.msg.5:
Your favorite places.
Your favorite food.
A feeling you can share with no one.
Isn't that great?
effect.0336.msg.6:
Ever noticed while talking to someone?
Conversation is nothing more than just a social obligation.
effect.0336.msg.7:
Did someone call your name?
Nobody's there…
Auditory hallucinations is the first sign of loneliness.
effect.0336.msg.8:
You once joined others in laughter.
Nowadays it's nothing but noise.
When did you change?
effect.0336.msg.9:
Nobody pays attention even when you talk to them.
You've gotten used to the feeling.
effect.0336.msg.10:
Remember the last time you said “See you next time” to someone?
When was the last time you did see them?
effect.0337.name: 야간 투시 - Pulse Armor

effect.0653.name: C.D. Absolute Drive
effect.0654.name: Chickening Out
effect.0654.desc.1: Things are starting to look dicey here.
effect.0654.desc.2: Time to call it quits right here and now.
effect.0656.name: Fiery Corruption
effect.0656.desc: Blackwing's curse foretells a demise in immolation.
effect.0657.name: Icy Corruption
effect.0657.desc: Blackwing's curse foretells a demise in frostbite.
effect.0658.name: Thundering Corruption
effect.0658.desc: Blackwing's curse foretells a demise in storms.
mob.0005.name: Bandit
mob.0005.desc:
A bandit that hunts for Shards and Artifacts.
Despite this, they are weak enough to take down without the aid of Artifacts.
This is but the prelude—the start of your long journey.
mob.0007.name: Ectoplasm
mob.0007.desc:
A peculiar spectral entity.
Its ability to absorb mana can be troublesome.
mob.0013.name: Cluster Creeper
mob.0013.desc:
It looks like any other ordinary creeper,
but it can burst into multiple creepers, causing even more chaos.
mob.0015.name: Watcher
mob.0015.desc:
An eye that watches your every move.
It's easy to think it'll be smooth sailing as long as you don't anger it,
but from the beginning you've already been perceived a threat.
mob.0016.name: Ominous Watcher
mob.0016.desc:
An eye that watches over and contemns you.
Scatters into multiple Watchers on death.
mob.0017.name: Fire Bird
mob.0017.desc:
A flying monster covered in flames.
Its attacks sets enemies on fire.
No, it's not immortal. It might not even be a bird to begin with.
mob.0019.name: Priest of Horus
mob.0019.desc:
A skeletal cleric.
It lacks in offensive ability,
but supports nearby allies through healing.
mob.0021.name: Demon Eye
mob.0021.desc:
An eldritch eye that floats in the air.
It slowly moves towards foes to attack.
This monster is rumored to have come from another world.
mob.0023.name: Chainsaw Zombie
mob.0023.desc:
A dauntless zombie that charges into enemies.
The weapon it carries is loud,
but isn't enough to ravage the gods.
mob.0026.name: Vena Anima
mob.0026.desc:
A monster that channels its powers from veins.
It can sedate its targets.
mob.0027.name: Skeletal Sniper
mob.0027.desc:
Skeletons are often known for their good aim,
but this one far surpasses the rest,
using a sniper rifle over the standard bow and arrow.
If caught in its sights, try to take cover if you can.
mob.0029.name: Skeletal Archer
mob.0029.desc:
It looks like an ordinary skeleton,
but has more health than the average.
Its arrows also pack a punch.
mob.0030.name: Warped
mob.0030.desc:
A drowned twisted by mana energies.
While it can swim, it deals raw Magic damage rather than Water damage.
mob.0031.name: Tomb Robber
mob.0031.desc:
A thief that digs up graves for treasure.
Attacks with the shovel they use for digging.
mob.0037.name: Conflagrator
mob.0037.desc:
A monster that spreads flames with its attacks.
It's best to put them out as soon as possible.
mob.0038.name: Laser Eye
mob.0038.desc:
A eye-shaped machine.
Beware of its high-energy plasma lasers!
It can phase through walls, so don't think you can run away unscathed.
mob.0047.name: Heretic
mob.0049.name: Frostbinder
mob.0049.desc:
A monster that shoots ice arrows.
Getting hit by these arrows slows down your movements.
mob.0053.name: Executioner
mob.0053.desc:
They seethe in hatred.
Its duty ends when the heads of all sinners are cut off.
When attacking, it teleports around to confuse its enemies.
mob.0056.name: Stormtrifler
mob.0056.desc:
A capricious monster charged with lightning.
It messes with its enemies, often moving in a flash.
mob.0057.name: Void Warrior
mob.0057.desc:
A monster born from empty void.
It can fight with both a sword and bow.
mob.0058.name: Spreading Mist
mob.0058.desc:
A mysterious mist that expands when left unchecked.
It corrodes your body as you touch it.
mob.0060.name: Volatile Detonator
mob.0060.desc:
Creates an explosion stronger than a creeper's.
Fortunately, it doesn't destroy blocks.
mob.0062.name: entity.minecraft.drowned
mob.0062.desc:
A trident-wielding drowned.
Best to take it out quickly lest you take it attacks.
mob.0063.name: Wraith
mob.0063.desc:
A spectral entity that remains even in death.
While a minor threat, its arrows can blind you momentarily.
mob.0064.name: Arteria Anima
mob.0064.desc:
A monster that channels its powers from arteries.
It energizes whenever it attacks.
mob.0065.name: Nightshade
mob.0065.desc:
A phantom that blends in the darkness, ambushing careless individuals.
When you hear its cries, look out for emerald-green eyes.
mob.0073.name: Clutch Spider
mob.0073.desc:
Spits a line of cobweb and teleports where it lands.
It's said its webs are so sticky to the point of suffocation.
mob.0074.desc:
Throws explosive melons at players.
Why do the melons explode? They just do.
mob.0075.name: Leucocyte
mob.0075.desc:
White blood cells attack foreign objects, such as players.
Its attacks reduces the enemy's armor.
mob.0076.desc:
Throws explosive gold melons at players.
Being made of gold, the explosion also creates lightning and deals more DMG than regular melons.
The melon itself isn't that tasty; it is gold after all.
mob.0077.name: Chorus Zombie
mob.0077.desc: If I were to describe it…it's surely a chorus fruit!
mob.0080.name: Gildbones
mob.0080.desc:
A skeleton of golden bones.
Rumor has it it's just a surface coating.
mob.0080.head: Gildbone Skull
mob.0081.name: Snow Cloud
mob.0081.desc:
Watch your head, it may be ready to attack at a moment's notice.
It slows down your movements, making escape difficult.
mob.0084.name: Priest of Falcios
mob.0084.desc:
A high priest under the command of Tutankhamun.
They chant incantations, summoning powerful soulfire magic,
as well as support allies through healing.
mob.0085.name: entity.minecraft.enderman
mob.0085.desc:
A commonly-seen enderman.
As a neutral mob, its best to take it down in one go while it isn't hostile
mob.0089.name: Mutilator
mob.0089.desc:
A reanimated skeleton born from constructed from numerous bones.
When attacked, loosely-attached bones may fly off.
The axe it wields appears strong, but is comparatively dull.
mob.0104.name: Mad Scientist
mob.0104.desc:
A skeleton enlightened by unorthodox alchemy.
It attacks by throwing potions of varying effects.
They've got a screw loose in there somewhere.
mob.0106.name: Mini Shulker
mob.0106.desc:
A bite-sized shulker.
While small, it can still pose as much a threat as regular shulkers.
If anything, its small size makes it even more diabolical.
mob.0107.name: Dark Enderman
mob.0107.desc:
A hard-to-see enderman.
Its attacks blinds players.
Truly a devious being.
mob.0114.desc:
A monster adorned in shiny jewels.
It counters ranged attacks with a magical bullet.
Keeping them in melee range may suppress their counters.
mob.0115.name: entity.minecraft.piglin
mob.0115.desc:
Just an ordinary piglin.
If you've got spare gold, you might get something interesting out of them.
mob.0124.name: Skeletal Harpy
mob.0124.desc:
This skeleton wears a pair of wings,
allowing it to maneuver itself out of combat.
It shoots arrows from the sky.
mob.0138.name: Combat Turret
mob.0138.desc:
An automaton of military design.
It's equipped with a gun that fires a triple round burst, filling players with holes.
Those who said the gun is actually a non-lethal taser are so full of it.
mob.0139.name: Blast Eye
mob.0139.desc:
An eye-shaped monster that creates explosion.
Its inability to fly scores it as having average mobility,
but its firepower packs enough of a punch to warrant caution.
mob.0139.head: Blast Eye's Head
mob.0141.name: Honey Archer
mob.0141.desc:
A sticky archer that shoots arrows.
Its arrows are similarly sticky, making players sticky on hit.
To top it off, its arrows are tipped with a sticky poison.
mob.0142.name: Honey Soldier
mob.0142.desc:
A sticky soldier that wields a sword.
Its sticky sword slows down whatever it strikes.
The sword in particular looks rather sharp.
mob.0146.name: Prismarine Warrior
mob.0146.desc:
A warrior emerging from ocean depths.
While lacking in special abilities, it's best not to let your guard down.
mob.0147.name: Prismarine Slayer
mob.0147.desc:
A soldier dwelling in ocean depths.
It strikes the moment you let your guard down.
mob.0148.name: Prismarine Spear-Thrower
mob.0148.desc:
A monster lurking in ocean depths.
The trident it throws warrants caution.
It possesses average defense, however, leaves it open to attacks.
mob.0150.name: Corruption
mob.0150.desc:
An unethical vice.
It spreads a noxious cloud.
mob.0151.desc:
An unethical vice.
It rearranges your genes, turning them fragile.
mob.0152.name: Desire
mob.0152.desc:
An unethical vice.
Absorbs MP to increase its DMG.
mob.0153.desc:
An unethical vice.
Sways the mind, drawing its full attention.
mob.0154.desc:
An unethical vice.
Grows mad over time, bringing ruin to all.
No exceptions, including itself.
mob.0155.name: Immorality
mob.0155.desc:
An unethical vice.
Fires a barrage of bullets that warp the mind.
mob.0156.desc:
An unethical vice.
Obstructs the path forward.
mob.0159.name: Frozen Guardian
mob.0159.desc:
A guardian wielding a blade of frost.
It pursues invaders till the end.
mob.0160.name: Frozen Marksman
mob.0160.desc:
A marksman whose bow creates ice sculptures.
You'll make for great material.
mob.0161.name: Treefeller
mob.0161.desc:
A lumberjack that cut down trees and all sorts of things,
such as other players.
mob.0162.name: Sheep-chan
mob.0162.desc:
These sheep infinitely respawn.
Punch em' for free blocks.
mob.0166.name: Flying Potion
mob.0166.desc:
A potion that can fly through unknown means.
Its known for having negative effects inside.
A truly troublesome piece of glass.
mob.0169.name: entity.minecraft.blaze
mob.0169.desc:
Just an ordinary blaze.
Be careful not to let its flames spread too far.
mob.0171.name: Warped Treefeller
mob.0171.desc:
A lumberjack that reaps souls.
Its attacks lower your Max HP.
mob.0176.name: Killer Bee
mob.0176.desc:
A murderous insect.
Just like regular bees, it takes lethal DMG upon stinging.
mob.0177.name: entity.minecraft.pillager
mob.0177.desc:
A pillager equipped with special arrows.
Nobody knows exactly what is in those arrows.
mob.0178.name: entity.minecraft.vindicator
mob.0178.desc:
A vindicator wielding a lightning sword.
It's probably just a stolen Artifact.
mob.0179.name: Tridenticator
mob.0181.name: Magic Bookshelf
mob.0181.desc:
An animated bookshelf.
It casts a random magic spell.
It seems to lack any long-ranged spells.
mob.0182.name: Skull Raven
mob.0182.desc:
This wither skeleton wears pair of wings.
It maneuvers through the air, shooting powerful fire arrows.
mob.0186.name: Fierce Bee
mob.0187.name: Flame Mage
mob.0187.desc:
Well-versed in flame magics.
The only spell they cast is the humble fireball,
which they've honed into a powerful spell.
mob.0188.name: Piglin Elite
mob.0188.desc:
A merciless piglin brute.
They won't fall for bribery.
mob.0189.name: Water Mage
mob.0189.desc:
Well-versed in water magics.
It casts a spell to creates powerful tides.
Take care not to stand in front of them.
mob.0190.name: Thunder Mage
mob.0190.desc:
Well-versed in thunder magics.
Casts lightning bolts at the player's feet with precision.
They can cast spells outside of your sight, requiring you to search them out.
mob.0191.name: Piglin Hunter
mob.0201.name: Scorched Dream
mob.0201.desc:
A hunter carrying a blade on the right, a crossbow on the left.
It was all but a long night's dream.
mob.0202.name: Hunter's Dream
mob.0202.desc:
A hunter carrying a blade on the right, a crossbow on the left.
May your awakening be fortunate.
mob.0204.name: Infernal Watcher
mob.0204.desc:
It gazes upon hell itself.
It slowly drifts towards your direction,
but may occasionally enter a frenzy, charging at great speeds.
mob.0205.name: Skeletal Soldier
mob.0205.desc:
A skeleton that wields both an axe and bow.
It uses a bow for long-range targets, brandishing its axe for melee combat.
It lacks the intelligence to control the distance on its own.
mob.0206.name: Skeletal Basher
mob.0206.desc:
A skeletal soldier that utilizes a quickstep to close the distance.
It shoots from afar while getting close, while disengaging during melee combat.
Wearing a suit of iron, it's got it feeling like high-class warrior.
mob.0210.desc:
An eldritch eye gazing in chromatic splendor.
This troublesome monster flies around while shooting magical bullets.
It's known to inhabit an unexpectedly varied amount of areas.
mob.0210.head: %s
mob.0214.name: Self-Destruct Drone
mob.0214.desc:
A radar-fitted combat patrol sentry.
It charges towards whatever it picks up on its radar.
Equipped with high-explosive warheads weighing 25kg.
mob.0217.name: Medusa Eye
mob.0217.desc:
A monstrous eye said to petrify those who look at it.
Though it will still petrify you regardless if you look at it or not.
mob.0219.name: Aorta Anima
mob.0219.desc:
A monster that channels its powers from aortae.
It explodes as its HP drops, healing nearby enemies.
mob.0220.name: Vena Cava Anima
mob.0220.desc:
A monster that channels its powers from large veins.
It can sedate its targets.
mob.0227.name: Frost Eye
mob.0227.desc:
A monstrous eye shaped by frost.
Freezing to the touch.
Its attacks hurt even more while you're slowe down.
mob.0227.head: %s
mob.0232.name: Honey Leader
mob.0232.desc:
A sticky leader of sticky companions.
It shoots a sticky beam while also healing nearby enemies.
Best to slay the leader before he gets the chance to heal.
mob.0233.name: Honey Floater
mob.0233.desc:
A sticky floater stickily floating in the air.
Its arrows inflict Slow Falling.
It's so sticky that even the air itself may become sticky.
mob.0234.name: Walleye
mob.0234.desc:
A mechanical eye.
It charges towards players in its sights, causing an explosion.
It's best to go for them before they lock onto you.
mob.0235.name: Mandarin Thrower
mob.0235.desc:
Tries to forcefeed you mandarin oranges.
Beware of a vitamin C overdose.
mob.0236.name: Jizō Guardian
mob.0236.desc:
A construct of unorthodox faith.
It inflicts divine punishment to those who break it.
Best you can do it brush off the snow on its head.
mob.0236.curse: %s was cursed by a Jizō Guardian for attacking it.
mob.0236.favor: The Jizō Guardian repaid the favor for cleaning it.
mob.0238.name: Poltergeist
mob.0238.desc:
Attacked by a set of sentient, hostile armor?
This must be the work of a poltergeist.
mob.0239.name: Poltergeist
mob.0239.desc:
Attacked by weapons floating in the air?
This must be the work of a poltergeist.
mob.0241.name: Poltergeist Abberant
mob.0241.desc:
Attacked by a set of sentient, hostile armor?
This must be the work of a poltergeist.
A particularly strong one at that.
mob.0242.name: Poltergeist Abberant
mob.0242.desc:
Attacked by weapons floating in the air?
This must be the work of a poltergeist.
A particularly strong one at that.
mob.0244.name: Immolating Spider
mob.0244.desc:
You feel your body might catch aflame if you punch it.
Not to worry, it won't burn your blocks at the very least.
mob.0245.name: Fire Creeper
mob.0245.desc:
A creeper lit aflame to soon set all ablaze.
It spreads fire as it self-ignites.
In exchange, its lost its destructive abilities.
mob.0253.name: Indwelled
mob.0253.desc:
A soldier possessed by a large eye.
The soldier remains conscious as the parasite remains.
Perhaps you could call this a form of symbiosis?
mob.0254.name: Headless
mob.0254.desc:
An Indwelled soldier released from its eye host.
Its become more agile now that its heavy host has detached.
mob.0255.name: Indweller
mob.0255.desc:
A monstrous eye that inhabits other lifeforms.
It possesses a strange dependency for the creatures it indwells.
mob.0257.name: Tome of Distortion
mob.0257.desc:
A sentient spellbook.
It can phase in enemies from another space.
Take care not to be cornered while fighting it.
mob.0258.name: Distorted Space
mob.0259.name: Shadow Stalker
mob.0259.desc:
A creature that blends with the shadows.
Camouflaged by shadows, it cannot be perceived normally,
but a little light may reveal its form.
mob.0261.name: Laser Eye Mk-Ⅱ
mob.0261.desc:
An enhanced laser eye.
It fires a high-energy plasma ray.
It also inherits the wall-phasing functionality from its predecessor.
mob.0264.name: Dark Summoner
mob.0264.desc:
A mage well-versed in dark magics.
Draws dark energy from a false Artifact to summon familiars to attack for him.
mob.0265.name: Dark Familiar
mob.0265.desc:
A familiar summoned from dark magic.
Casts magical spells while floating aimlessly around its master.
mob.0269.name: Goblin
mob.0269.desc: An enemy that feels befitting of early game adventures.
mob.0270.name: Loather
mob.0270.desc:
I hate everything! You! Me! Everything!
Has high jump strength, but lacking in any synergetic moves.
He's got that vexing attitude.
mob.0271.name: Indomitable Warrior
mob.0271.desc:
A swordsman who never backs down.
This foe's will won't be broken easily.
mob.0273.name: Hellblade Bot
mob.0273.desc:
A guard bot specializing in mutilation. Its threat should be self-apparent.
Floor, walls, even the ceiling—it'll chase you down wherever you are.
A complex pathing system determines its unique movement patterns.
mob.0274.name: Death Saw Roomba
mob.0274.desc:
It lacks the functionality to map out §mcrime scenes§r rooms.
Instead, it's programmed with a heuristic decision-making algorithm with modes such as:
directional adjustment on collision, hole-avoidance, and murder.
mob.0280.name: Inferno Aspirant
mob.0280.desc:
Burn! Burn!
They manifest the desire to burn all islands.
It leaps away at unnatural speeds when attacked.
mob.0283.name: entity.minecraft.guardian
mob.0283.desc:
Just an ordinary guardian.
It has no other special features.
mob.0287.name: Burning Stomper
mob.0287.desc:
A leaping skeleton with sturdy legs.
It stomps the ground, creating fiery shockwaves on impact.
On top of that, it's too heavy to be knocked back.
mob.0292.name: Trample-Bot
mob.0292.desc:
A guard bot stationed in laboratories, discharging electric burts wherever it stomps.
Its movement subroutines were simplified for only jump maneuvers.
In hindsight, these machines may be a bit too dangerous for the lab.
mob.0313.name: Burning Blaze
mob.0313.desc:
A blaze under the rule of Blazing Inferno.
Its appearance may seem like an ordinary blaze, but it's certainly stronger than one.
mob.0321.name: Mini Guardian
mob.0321.desc:
A tiny guardian.
Despite the size, its attacks packs a punch.
mob.0330.desc:
A warrior manifested from auroral lights.
The reaper moniker comes from its persistent desire to slay you.
mob.0331.desc:
A mage of the aurora.
It hops backwards whilst casting auroral magic.
It also creates a platform for itself whenever it falls.
mob.0336.name: Sakura Echo
mob.0336.desc:
A spirit that manifests where cherry blossom petals fall.
Occasionally creates petal storms.
It seems to have claimed many victims' lives.
mob.0363.name: Tome of Palehex
mob.0363.desc:
A white spellbook.
It flies with unpredictable speeds.
Its attacks can also lower your Magic RES.
mob.0369.name: Tome of Hellfire
mob.0369.desc:
A flaring hot spellbook.
It casts flame spells from a distance.
mob.0370.name: Tome of Torrents
mob.0370.desc:
A dripping wet spellbook.
It washes away those who get close with a crashing wave.
mob.0371.name: Tome of Storms
mob.0371.desc:
A shocking spellbook.
It flies above your head to cast down lightning bolts.
mob.0373.name: Golden Coffin
mob.0374.name: Ashen Coffin
mob.0374.desc:
A coffin with an ominous presence.
Best to destroy it as soon as possible.
mob.0397.name: Crystal Turret
mob.0397.desc:
A crystal turret created by Ecual.
It might become trouble if not dealt with quickly.
mob.0398.name: Crystal Healer
mob.0398.desc:
A crystal healer created by Ecual.
It might become trouble if not dealt with quickly.
mob.0399.name: Tome of Void
mob.0399.desc:
A spellbook created by Ecual.
なんか無茶苦茶、弾を発射してくるけどなんでだろう？
もしかして飛んでるから……？
mob.0400.name: Tome of Combustion
mob.0400.desc:
A spellbook created by Ecual.
近づいてみな？　爆発するぜ？
mob.0401.name: Tome of Darkness
mob.0401.desc:
A spellbook created by Ecual.
放置していると、目が見えなくなりますね。
mob.0402.name: Tome of Drowning
mob.0402.desc:
A spellbook created by Ecual.
Best deal with it if you don't want to drown.
mob.0415.desc:
A skeletal sniper equipped with an anti-materiel rifle.
Not even the walls are reliable defense.
Only you can rely on yourself.
mob.0417.name: Astro Skeleton
mob.0417.desc:
A skeleton who operates from space.
Boasting not only impressive agility,
 they can also cross through time and space.
mob.0418.name: Astro Zombie
mob.0418.desc:
A zombie who operates from space.
Affected by space radiation, it grows stronger the longer you neglect it.
Doesn't seem to be a Newtype.
mob.0419.name: Astro Drowned
mob.0419.desc:
A drowned who operates from space.
Tears a rift through time and space to attack.
Apparently this is what you get when zombies drown in space.
mob.0420.name: Astro Blaze
mob.0420.desc:
A blaze who operates from space.
Possesses high-performance mobility and strong firepower.
mob.0421.name: Skittering Turret
mob.0421.desc:
A silverfish with a turret mounted on its head.
Fires strong Skittering Bullets.
mob.0422.name: Skittering Bullet
mob.0422.desc:
A bullet fired from a Skittering Turret.
Naturally, it also skitters.
mob.0423.name: Spellblade
mob.0423.desc:
A vanguard mage whose blade is enchanted with magics.
As a mage, they possess magical resistance but are weak to physical attacks.
mob.0424.name: Icestomper
mob.0424.desc:
A stomper with sturdy, ice-cold legs.
Every stomp stirs up a fierce blizzard.
mob.0429.name: Killer Bee
mob.0436.name: Scattered Air Mine
mob.0436.desc:
An anti-infantry mine scattered from the air.
Its fuse ignites upon landing and can be detonated.
Loaded with the bare minimum firepower to deter any who trespasses onto this region.
mob.0439.name: Training Dummy
mob.0440.name: Fragile Training Dummy
mob.0441.name: Physical-Resistant Training Dummy
mob.0441.desc:
Records DPS after 15s of attacks.
Boasts high Physical RES, low Magic RES.
mob.0442.name: Magic-Resistant Training Dummy
mob.0442.desc:
Records DPS after 15s of attacks.
Boasts high Magic RES, low Physical RES.
boss.0046.name: Clock of Despair
boss.0046.desc:
A timeless clock that never decays, nor can it be destroyed.
It can't be defeated through ordinary means.
One can only wait until the Time is right.
boss.0055.name: Hetukedah
boss.0055.desc:
A low-order Angel with large fists.
Beware of when h 奴がオーラをまとった時には注意が必要だ。
His overflowing mana is immense enough to possibly warp your flesh.
boss.0059.name: Jack o' Lantern
boss.0059.desc:
A peculiar Angel with a pumpkin head.
Its powers are fairly unconvential and eccentric for low-order Angels.
It seems you'll need more than brute force to overcome it.
boss.0078.name: Thunder Manifest
boss.0078.desc:
The discordant manifestation of the thunder's cry.
It moves as fast as lightning and overwhelms its foes with fierce arrows and thunder.
boss.0123.name: Lexiel
boss.0123.desc:
The Angel of Oaths. She would offer even her own life for the sake of her beloved lord.
Her charming appearance contrasts her erratic fighting style.
She's proficient with both swords and magic.
boss.0175.name: Queen Bee
boss.0175.desc:
A high-order Angel—the Queen of the Hive.
She holds no restraint for intruders seeking the Artifact that lies in her nest.
Despite her size, she breezes by enemies at unimaginable speeds.
mob.0213.name: Terrible Sonic Bomber
mob.0213.desc:
A combat aircraft fashioned with variable-sweep wings.
各種ミサイルに加えて無誘導爆弾や領域拒否兵器の運用をできる。
近年ではさらにドローンの運用能力を追加されている。
boss.0213.tutorial: Protect the Anti-Air Cannon and intercept enemy attacks
boss.0213.tips: [ᴛɪᴩꜱ]対空砲は自動で天使を攻撃します。破壊された場合自動で修理され、プレイヤーは%sで修理の支援をできます。
boss.0224.name: Jack o' Lantern
boss.0224.desc:
##TODO, copy from above 頭がカチボャな奇跡な天使。
下級天使ではあるが、微妙で独自な技を使う。
ただ攻撃しているだけでは、勝てないだろう。
boss.0237.name: Lunatic Magus
boss.0237.desc:
A high-order Angel adept at various studies of magic.
The magic he wields is a cut above what the other mages are capable of.
When pushed to his limits, he calls upon the elements for a powerful combo.
boss.0301.name: Karmic Kleshas
boss.0301.desc:
Bearer of sin.
罪人として彼女が与えるもの、それは死である。
Her menacing attacks inhibit your ability to heal.
boss.0311.name: Blazing Inferno
boss.0311.desc:
Both his body and personality shine resplendently.
His tough punches pulverize even the toughest of blocks as if they were made of tofu!
He can gather his flames into a focused fireball in his hands.
boss.0327.name: Eclael
boss.0327.desc:
オーロラは滅多にみられるものではない。
たとえ姿を見せたとしても、いつも眠そうにフラフラしている。
元気に活動している姿を見られたら超ラッキー。
boss.0339.name: Sapphiel
boss.0339.desc:
冷静沈着な双子の片割れ。
銃火器により正確無比に弱点を射抜く。
食べることが好きで甘いものに目が無い。
boss.0340.name: Rubiel
boss.0340.desc:
感情豊かな双子の片割れ。
刀剣により、華麗に勢い任せに戦う。
服やアクセサリーを作るのが大好き。
boss.0341.name: Louvert
boss.0341.desc:
A high-order Angel wielding a pair of fiery twinblades.
It's rumored that their immolating flames can devour everything it touches.
On another note, the Angel is neither male nor female.
boss.0365.name: C.D. Frestchika
boss.0365.desc:
A high-order Angel fused with highly performant cybernetic body.  高性能な機械の身体を持つ天使。
テレポートやブーストを駆使した動きで敵を翻弄する。
「アブソリュートドライブ」により、限界を超えた性能を発揮することができる。
boss.0372.name: Tutankhamun
boss.0372.desc:
その名は有名なファラオを彷彿とさせるが、
この天使は、様々な歴史や、人々の持つイメージなどを元に作り上げられた存在でしかない。
一体どんなイメージが紛れ込んだのか、この天使は魔術と剣術、両方に秀でている。
boss.0376.name: The Sinner
boss.0376.desc:
Judge of Sinners.
To all bearers of sin, he heralds the forecoming of death.
His menacing attacks inhibit your ability to heal.
boss.0378.name: Red Knight
boss.0378.desc: (Any info is too fuzzy to make out…)
boss.0380.name: Haruclaire
boss.0380.desc:
Self-proclaimed absolute-zero entertainer.
Can't forget your charming looks even in the heat of combat!激しき戦いの中にも「魅せ」は大事。
Today's a rehearsal with her best buddy Hatoclaire.
boss.0390.name: Otherworldly Rabbits
boss.0391.name: Axia
boss.0391.desc:
A high-order rabbit Angel.
大剣を振り回し、力試しと言わんばかりに襲いかかってくる。
彼女が望むのは戦いなのか、あるいは……
boss.0392.name: Ecual
boss.0392.desc:
A high-order rabbit Angel.
独特な杖を扱って、放つ魔法はとてつもない威力を誇る。
アキシャの妹で、彼女の乱暴な言動にいつも辟易しているらしい。
boss.0393.name: Labyria
boss.0393.desc:
A high-order rabbit Angel.
銃剣の扱いを得意としており、様々な武器で敵を翻弄する。
大体アキシャと一緒にやんちゃをしてエクアルを困らせているらしい。
boss.0410.name: Blackwing
boss.0410.desc:
The reincarnation of blackening calamity—also known by his true name: Heiloang.
Paltry whelp; thou shalt not witness, thou shalt not harken, thou shalt not fathom.
To trifle with forbidden anathema is the most foolish sin a mortal can bear.
boss.0411.name: Hellflame Drake
boss.0411.desc:
The ruler of Purgatory; the conflagrating tyrant—also known by his true name: Behemoth.
Fools who invite the Monarch's wrath shall be engulfed in azure flame.
To impede the impending doom, try to take both drakes down at the same time.
boss.0412.name: Tenebrous Drake
boss.0412.desc:
The gelid lord; the paragon of darkness—also known by his true name: Tiamat.
Fools who invite the Monarch's wrath shall know the chilling terror of darkness.
To impede the impending doom, try to take both drakes down at the same time.
boss.0416.name: Ahssat
boss.0416.desc:
夏毛狼のアサットは弾幕攻撃と分裂する力を持っている。
増えて、増えて、更に増える。
boss.0437.name: Lawless Iron Giant
boss.0437.desc:
Formerly a nameless exhibition in this museum, now the protector of its cursed Artifact.
It's unclear what makes it so “lawless” but its attacks sure are unruly.
だが、一部の攻撃は飛び越えることでも回避できるかもしれない。
boss.1004.name: Tultaria
boss.1004.desc: A harbinger of calamity, threatening the world beyond.
boss.1005.name: Oathbound Phantasm
boss.1005.desc:
A mindless phantasm born from an Angel.
It shields its master from most attacks.
object.1029.name: Spirit
object.1058.name: Brave Knight
object.1119.title: WORLD PURIFIED
item.trader.lock: Can only be purchased at %s%% completion.
island.0.book.tp.p1:
- Teleporter Guide -

When you purify an island, you unlock its %1$s.

%2$s while on it. Your vision will darken, preparing for teleportation.

Align your sights to the %3$s and %4$s to teleport to your destination.
island.0.book.gacha.p1:
Shard Processor Guide


With a Shard in hand, place into the machine.

The better the Shard, the higher the quality of Artifacts you can obtain.
you should probably skip this for now

god.flora.believe.msg.2.2: and blooming life be with you.
god.flora.unbelieve.msg.2.1: To think you would abandon me…
god.flora.unbelieve.msg.2.2: Go on then, you may leave…
god.nyaptov.believe.msg.1.3: (せいぜい、頑張ってくれたまえよ…)
god.nyaptov.believe.msg.2.2: (気でも向いたらでいいんだけど、)
god.nyaptov.believe.msg.2.3: (魚とか、持ってきてくれると嬉しいなぁ。)
god.nyaptov.unbelieve.msg.1.3: (そんなもんだろうと、思ってたよ。)
god.rumor.believe.msg.1.1: 私を選んでくれたんだね？
god.rumor.unbelieve.msg.2.1: もういい、あなたなんて知らない。
god.rumor.unbelieve.msg.2.2: どこか遠くにでも、行けばいいよ…。
god.rumor.mercy.msg.1: これくらいのことしか、してあげられないけど…
god.urban.believe.msg.1.2: Very well, I have high expectations
god.urban.believe.msg.2.1: I'll lend you my power anytime.
god.urban.believe.msg.2.2: After all, we're always connected!吾は汝と共にあるぞ！
god.urban.mercy.msg.1: 汝にささやかながらの救済を！
god.wiki.believe.msg.1.2: Very well, I'll be watching over
god.wiki.believe.msg.2.1: そして、僕も君の期待に応えよう。
god.wiki.believe.msg.2.2: マナ本来の力を引き出してみせるよ。
god.wiki.unbelieve.msg.1.2: 君もその程度だったってことか。

chat.tutorial.1.1: The islands in this realm have been cursed.
chat.tutorial.1.2.s: You have but one goal: To %s
chat.tutorial.1.2.m: You and your allies have but one goal: To %s
chat.tutorial.1.with: fully cleanse the curse from this realm.
chat.tutorial.2.s:
Before you lies a %s, the source of an island's corruption.
You must cleanse the curse that lay within.
Get close and offer a prayer (Hold %s without moving) to cleanse the Artifact.
chat.tutorial.2.m:
Before you lies a %s, the source of an island's corruption.
You and your allies must cleanse the curse that lay within.
Get close and offer a prayer (Hold %s without moving) to cleanse the Artifact.
chat.tutorial.2.skip: You must cleanse the Artifact. Get close and offer a prayer (Hold %s without moving).
chat.tutorial.3:
When you cleanse an island, you gain a blessing. These items are called %s.
Artifacts are special items that can only be wielded by those who worship a Deity.
chat.tutorial.4.s:
This realm is home to 5 great %s, of whom you will eventually be able to worship.
Through worship, you are graced with blessings and can wield the power of Artifacts.
Though irrevent, you may change faiths at any time.
chat.tutorial.4.m:
This realm is home to 5 great %s, of whom you and your allies will eventually be able to worship.
Through worship, you are graced with blessings and can wield the power of Artifacts.
Though irrevent, you may change faiths at any time.
chat.tutorial.5:
%s are scattered throughout the realm, through which monsters are born.
These spawners can only be broken by slaying enough of the mobs that spawn.
chat.tutorial.6.s:
When slain, a %s is built where you fell, carrying your items.
Graves can be harvested by using %s on them. However,
if you are slain before you can reach it, your items will be claimed by your worshipped Deity.
If you fall into the void, your items will be claimed by your Deity with no grave.
chat.tutorial.6.m:
When slain, a %s is built where you fell, carrying your items.
Graves can be harvested by using %s on them. However,
if you are slain before you can reach it, your items will be claimed by your worshipped Deity.
If you fall into the void, your items will be claimed by your Deity with no grave.
chat.tutorial.7:
Lost items can be %s from the Pantheon after cleansing an island.
You may also beg for your Deity's mercy to reclaim a portion of your lost items.
chat.tutorial.8:
Past this gate, a portal to the %s lies nearby.
A good course of action would be to make your way to it and worship a Deity.
chat.island_purify.title: ISLAND PURIFIED
chat.island_purify.subtitle: PROGRESS %s %s %s (%s%%)
chat.island_purify.notif: [!] Lost items have been returned to the pantheon.
chat.tips.1:
Stone has a chance to drop ore when mined, with each pickaxe tier increasing the rate of drops.
Cobblestone can also drop ores, but at a reduced rate.
chat.tips.2: Islands can be cleansed even without breaking their spawners.
chat.tips.3:
Fall DMG in this realm is a lot stronger than normal.
Even with plenty of health, careless mistakes can still cost you.
chat.tips.4:
When your items are claimed by a Deity,
you can pray for mercy to reclaim a portion of your lost items.
chat.tips.5:
Certain Artifacts have the ability to rescue you from the Void, should you fall in.
The “Divine Protection” set is one such Artifact.
chat.tips.6:
While trading, [ꜱᴩᴀᴄᴇ+ʟᴇꜰᴛ ꜱʜɪꜰᴛ] on a selected trade can speed up the process.
 Convenient for bulk trading.
chat.tips.7: Farming crops is a more efficient way of farming currency over wool.
chat.tips.8:
Walking into battle with no armor is suicide.
If lacking in defensive Artifacts, the cheap armor kits on offer are better than nothing.
chat.tips.9:
The “Book of All-Seeing” sold by the General Supplier can be used to read the info of you and your targets.
If faced with a foe stronger than your gear, turning back is an option.
chat.tips.10: HP healed through Saturation scales with your Max HP.
chat.tips.11:
During combat, natural health regeneration is considerably reduced.
When low on HP, retreating can be beneficial.
chat.tips.12:
You can visit any island at any time. However,
beware of enemies that greatly surpass you in strength.
chat.tips.13:
Many offensive Artifacts come with different cooldown timers.
Artifacts that share the same timer can't be used immediately after another.
chat.tips.14: In the End dimension, where time and weather hold no meaning, Artifacts that rely on it can operate at their full potential.
chat.tips.15:
Debuffs afflicted by enemies can be split into %s and %s.
These can be differentiated by the amount of lines in their icon in the corner.
chat.tips.16: When up against AoE or ground attacks, a third-person perspective may be helpful here.
chat.tips.17:
Nectar sold by the Potion Merchant is the most basic healing Artifact.
When sparse in other healing options, these may come in handy.
chat.tips.18:
Artifacts that use the Special Cooldown often pack a lot of firepower.
Up against strong foes, these may turn the tide of battle. Use them wisely.
chat.tips.19: %s can help save trips back for backup wool/food and stashing Artifacts found in your travels, making for a smooth journey.
chat.tips.20:
Summon-type Artifacts are effective against enemies that fly freely in the air.
They can take care of the cleanup for you.
chat.tips.21:
If you find that enemies are difficult to kill, they may be resistant towards your Artifact's element(s).
Try different builds and Artifacts based on your faith and enemy's resistances.
